page.title: 01MARKS TEY AREA_INTRODUCTION
page.content: {Marks Tey}is approximately seven miles from {Colchester.}It is a village of contrasts-the old including a Norman church and large modern housing estates.It is situated on the junction of two busy{roads,}the A12 and the A120.This plus good {rail services} means it is well situated for travel to London, Ipswich, the coast, etc. These same roads have also split the village, the old being one side of the A12, the new the other. The surrounding countryside is good arable {farmland}growing a variety of crops.The area boasts a number of { {nurseries.}Also a{brickworks. Approximately 2000 people live in the area,few being native to the area.
